Action Language for UML (Alf) Open Source Reference Implementation
Licensing Information

Model Driven Solutions, Inc. (formerly Data Access Technologies Inc.) is the copyright 
owner of the source code in this software entitled the Action Language for UML (Alf) 
Open Source Reference Implementation (the "Software"). The copyright owner hereby 
licenses such Software to you for use under the GNU General Public License (GPL) 
version 3 (at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html and attached hereto as 
gpl-3.0.txt). 

The Software uses the following software programs licensed under the Apache
License version 2.0 (at http://www.opensource.org/licenses/afl-3.0.php and
attached hereto as Apache-License-2.0.txt):

Apache log4j, http://logging.apache.org/
Apache commons logging, http://commons.apache.org/logging/

The Software uses the Foundational UML Reference Implementation
(http://fuml.modeldriven.org) under the Academic Free License version 3.0
(at http://www.opensource.org/licenses/afl-3.0.php and attached hereto as 
afl-3.0.txt). For further licensing information on the Foundation UML
Reference Implementation, see the file fUML-LICENSING.txt.

The Software uses software licensed under the Eclipse Public License version 
1.0 (at https://www.eclipse.org/org/documents/epl-v10.php and attached herto 
as epl-1.0.txt) related to:

Eclipse Modeling Framework, https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/modeling.emf.emf
Eclipse UML2, https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/modeling.mdt.uml2
Papyrus modeling tool, http://www.eclipse.org/papyrus
